cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Water-Type Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Water-Type Attack.

Effect: The user freely sets Foggy Weather for 3 rounds, and creatures within Range have a 20% chance of gaining @Affliction[burn] 5.

actions.name: Flash Boil
actions.description: Passive: The user is immune to the negative effects of Foggy Weather, and the user's Water-Type Attacks are considered to also have the Fire-Type.
